name: Museum of Symmetry
description: An absurdist mind-and-body romp through the feel-good alter-universe of cartoonist and animator Paloma Dawkins. Museum of Symmetry is a room-scale VR experience with 2D animation in a 3D playground as never seen before.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4.3 GB available space
